content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need something fixed with my electrical. The lights are flickering all the time and it's driving me crazy, but every company around here is useless. Are you actually any better?
I'm sorry to hear you've had a tough time with other companies. We always aim for great service. Can I get your name so I can better assist you?
It's Joe. But listen, I'm telling you, if I have to do all the runaround again, I'm just going to forget about it. I just want someone competent for once.
Thank you, Joe. I want to get you the help you need as quickly as possible. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm you're in our service area and get the right technician to you?
Yeah, you folks are all the same. It's 1417 Crystal Lane. But if one more person tells me they're coming and doesn't show up, I'm done.
Thank you for your address, Joe. We do serve your area. To make sure we get this scheduled at a good time for you, what day and time would work best for a technician to visit?
I want it done ASAP of course. I don't sit around waiting for people who never show. Can I get someone this evening or not? Also, how much is this going to cost or am I signing my life away again?

We can often provide same-day service for electrical issues, depending on availability. Our diagnostic fee starts at $89, and the total repair cost will depend on what’s causing the flickering. Would you like to check our soonest available slot for this evening?
89 bucks just to tell me what’s wrong? Figures. And I bet nobody can come anyway. Whatever, if you have a slot tonight, tell me. Otherwise I’m done.
I understand your concerns, Joe. We do have an available slot at 6:30 PM this evening. Would you like to book this time? There’s no obligation if you change your mind later.
I don’t know. I guess. But you know what, every time I try to get this stuff fixed, it ends up being a waste of time or way more expensive than you say. Honestly, I might just live with it.
It’s totally your choice, Joe. Our team will be there at your scheduled slot if you decide to go ahead. If you’d like to book or have any questions, just let me know anytime.
Nah, forget it. I’m just tired of all the back and forth. Don’t bother following up.
reason: Customer declined to schedule an appointment.
